amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to protect all existing flights at Ronald Reagan National Airport (DCA). This amendment adds 7 new roundtrip in-and-beyond perimeter slots to DCA split between the 7 airlines servicing the airport.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to protect all existing flights at Ronald Reagan National Airport (DCA) including the addition of 7 roundtrip in-and-beyond perimeter slots split between the 7 airlines servicing the airport.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 229 (Roll no. 357).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Owens.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 229 (Roll no. 357).
